remove_files.description: Removes all the backup files associated with artifact if flag is set.

post.summary: ListArtifacts returns a list of all backup artifacts.

data_model.description: DataModel is a model used for performing a backup.

status.description: BackupStatus shows the current status of execution of backup.

vendor.description: Database vendor e.g. PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL.

cron_expression.description: How often backup should be run in cron format.

retries.description: How many times to retry a failed backup before giving up.

retry_interval.description: Delay between each retry. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

start_time.description: First backup wouldn't happen before this time.

post.summary: GetLogs returns logs for provided artifact.

items.description: LogChunk represent one chunk of logs.

post.summary: ListArtifactCompatibleServices lists compatible services for restoring a backup.

artifact_id.description: Artifact id used to determine restore compatibility.

items.description: MongoDBService represents a generic MongoDB instance.

address.description:
Access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

items.description: MySQLService represents a generic MySQL instance.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

items.description: ScheduledBackup represents scheduled task for backup.

cron_expression.description: How often backup will be run in cron format.

data_model.description: DataModel is a model used for performing a backup.

retries.description: How many times to retry a failed backup before giving up.

retry_interval.description: Delay between each retry. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

start_time.description: First backup wouldn't happen before this time.

vendor.description: Database vendor e.g. PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL.

post.description:
Could return the Error message in the details containing specific ErrorCode indicating failure reason:
ERROR_CODE_XTRABACKUP_NOT_INSTALLED - xtrabackup is not installed on the service
ERROR_CODE_INVALID_XTRABACKUP - different versions of xtrabackup and xbcloud
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_XTRABACKUP - xtrabackup is not compatible with MySQL for taking a backup
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_TARGET_MYSQL - target MySQL version is not compatible with the artifact for performing a restore of the backup

service_id.description: Service identifier where backup should be restored.

retries.description: How many times to retry a failed backup before giving up.

retry_interval.description: Delay between each retry. Should have a suffix in JSON: 1s, 1m, 1h.

service_id.description: Service identifier where backup should be performed.

start_time.description: First backup wouldn't happen before this time.

post.description:
Could return the Error message in the details containing specific ErrorCode indicating failure reason:
ERROR_CODE_XTRABACKUP_NOT_INSTALLED - xtrabackup is not installed on the service
ERROR_CODE_INVALID_XTRABACKUP - different versions of xtrabackup and xbcloud
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_XTRABACKUP - xtrabackup is not compatible with MySQL for taking a backup
post.summary: StartBackup request backup specified service to location.

name.description: If empty then name is auto-generated.
